class Meta[source]

Meta(_datatypes:DataFrame=None, _definition:DataFrame=None, _description:DataFrame=None, _entity_definition:DataFrame=None, _entity:str=None, _is_unique_id:List[T]=None, _is_mandatory:List[T]=None, _name_clean:str=None, _name_raw:str=None)

Meta(_datatypes: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, _definition: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, _description: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, _entity_definition: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, _entity: str = None, _is_unique_id: List = None, _is_mandatory: List = None, _name_clean: str = None, _name_raw: str = None)

Example: make_definition¶

df = pd.util.testing.makeMixedDataFrame()
df.columns = ['UNIQUE ID', 'Basic value', 'textual DEscription', 'DATE-OF-OCCURENCE']
df
UNIQUE ID Basic value textual DEscription DATE-OF-OCCURENCE
0 0.0 0.0 foo1 2009-01-01
1 1.0 1.0 foo2 2009-01-02
2 2.0 0.0 foo3 2009-01-05
3 3.0 1.0 foo4 2009-01-06
4 4.0 0.0 foo5 2009-01-07 
dd = meta.make_definition(df)
dd
name_raw name_clean name_dashboard is_unique_id is_mandatory datatype
0 UNIQUE ID unique_id UniqueId None True float64
1 Basic value basic_value BasicValue None True float64
2 textual DEscription textual_description TextualDescription None True object
3 DATE-OF-OCCURENCE date_of_occurence DateOfOccurence None True datetime64[ns]
